project_url.title: Project URL
project_url.description: The URL of the BOINC project to attach.

api_key.title: API_KEY
api_key.description: Your API (weak) key provided by the project. For Rosetta, join [here](http://boinc.bakerlab.org/rosetta/)

rpc_password.title: RPC_PASSWORD
rpc_password.description: The RPC password (for remote GUI manager).
